Literature.Title: Pentadecaibins I-V: 15-Residue Peptaibols Produced by a Marine-Derived Trichoderma sp. of the Harzianum Clade
Literature.Author: van Bohemen AI, Ruiz N, Zalouk-Vergnoux A, Michaud A, Robiou du Pont T, Druzhinina I, Atanasova L, Prado S, Bodo B, Meslet-Cladiere L, Cochereau B, Bastide F, Maslard C, Marchi M, Guillemette T, Pouchus YF

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus CIP 53.156(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli CIP 54.8T(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=>100µg/ml),Human epithelial carcinoma KB(IC50=4.3±1.1µM)
